overview:
Matthew is a product manager and aspiring entrepreneur with a B.B.A. in Computer Information Systems and a focus on consumer web products.

Matthew has served as a consultant to the US Federal Government (US Patent and Trademark Office) as well as small and medium sized startups. He is extremely interested improving efficiency for users and solving large, high impact problems.

Leadership and volunteer experience include former service as President of a Jewish student organization, Representative for the College of Business in Student Government, and Chairman of a Northern Va Jewish young adult group.
